jd: From: jatin, Hmg America LLC jatin@hmgamerica.com Reply to: jatin@hmgamerica.com Role Title: Technical Project ManagerNo. of Positions: 1Hiring Mode: Contract (TP)Location: MountainView, CA globe.·Take accountability for driving the project deliverables on time.·Serve as the point of contact for external partner engagement for the program·Able to develop testplans, co-ordinate with QA, experience·Experience managing programs across cross functional teams, building processes and coordinating release schedules·Hands on experience in SW development or QA or device based feature launchesPreferred qualifications-·Experience in embedded software·Comfortable with operating in a high-paced, changing work environment with the ability to prioritize multiple functions and tasks,
